name: Altium Designer Workspace File
summary: A DSNWRK file contains information about a workspace created by Altium Designer, a CAD application used by engineers to design PCBs. It stores a group of Printed Circuit Board ( PCB ) projects ( .PRJPCB files), which is especially helpful for users working on interconnected projects. DSNWRK files include design documents that make up each project with each document storing electrical component layouts.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
